definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The nuns live in a cloister of calm.
sentences.chinese: 修女們住在一個幽靜的修道院裏。

sentences.english: Founded as a monastery center in the early 5th century, it is the capital of Moldavia.
sentences.chinese: 它於5世紀早期建立成爲一個修道院中心。

sentences.english: I'm seriously considering joining a monastry and taking holy orders .
sentences.chinese: 我正在慎重地考慮進修道院當修道士。

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教會服務，被關押在女修道院。

sentences.english: Monasteries originally developed in the Middle East and Greece form the hermits'buts.
sentences.chinese: 修道院的前身是中東和希臘的隱士隱居的茅舍。

sentences.english: They found an icon in the monastery .
sentences.chinese: 他們在修道院中發現了一個聖像。

sentences.english: There was a priory in the small town.
sentences.chinese: 這個小鎮裏有個小修道院。

sentences.english: Nacho was raised in a Mexican monastery and now he is the cook.
sentences.chinese: 奈奇在墨西哥的修道院中長大，現在則是裏面的廚師。

sentences.english: There is a monastery where the monks live in sin with women lovers.
sentences.chinese: 在一個修道院裏住着那些犯了色戒的修道士。

sentences.english: I like convent but I wish they will not admit any women under the age of fifty.
sentences.chinese: 朕喜歡女修道院，其不至收容年齡五十以下之婦人。

sentences.english: He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 他隱居於修道院中已三十餘年。

sentences.english: All the priories were made directly subject to the abbot of Cluny.
sentences.chinese: 所有小修道院都由克呂尼的院長直接管理。

sentences.english: The good abbot of holy wood is a strong pillar to the weak.
sentences.chinese: “聖林”修道院是弱者強有力的靠山。

sentences.english: If you’re visiting Europe, check with tourism boards about inexpensive rooms to rent in convents and monasteries.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去歐洲旅行，可以查查便宜的修道院住宿公告。

sentences.english: The mistake is continuing to think in terms of the old monastic dichotomies.
sentences.chinese: 這個錯誤是跟着古老的修道院式的二元論想法而來的。

sentences.english: "Five monasteries and 35 buildings collapsed in the town," he said.
sentences.chinese: 塔萊鎮有5座修道院和35座房屋倒塌。
